channel.title: How do I use the quest tab to get items?
channel.description:
Well I'm on a Fearny Pkz Base. I want to know how to:
1. Make a word in the quest tab like "AGS" And when you click it, you get the Ags.
I just want to know how to make words in the quest area and make them either give you items or tele you somewhere.

item.title: How do I use the quest tab to get items?
